nodes.text: Tragtath was a Hutt of the Bareesh kajidic who was active during the Galactic Civil War. Tragtath led regular expeditions by hundreds of slaves and experts to search for lost artifacts and treasures in ancient vaults on the planet Kor Bareesh, the throneworld of the Bareesh clan. However, the majority of these expeditions resulted in failure due to the harsh conditions on the world.
